alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:36PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butte and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 536 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bridal Veil Falls, or 4 miles southwest of Spearfish, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spearfish around 545 PM MDT. Saint Onge around 600 PM MDT. Belle Fourche around 605 PM MDT. Fruitdale around 615 PM MDT. Belle Fourche Reservoir around 625 PM MDT. Arpan around 630 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 5 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
